website_summaries.verdict: If you are searching for a featherweight yet sturdy selfie stick that takes moments to set up and use, this model is worth your attention.
pros: Easy to set up in selfie and tripod modes
cons: Its lightweight design makes it easy for wind to topple this tripod over

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a selfie stick that works for my phone. Every time I have ordered or even gone to Bestbuy, I am assured that the stick will work with my phone. New phone so I tried again and YES it works. And it works great! I had a little help from my daughter setting it up and getting it going. SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Johnston

customer_reviews.title: great device well made
customer_reviews.text: Used this selfie stick on my recent trip to China. Attached iPhone 11 to it and shot pics all day long. Battery life of bluetooth remote excellent, never ran out of power with recharging it daily. Held iPhone 11 very securely, never had it slip out. Tripod feature worked well. The combination of the Atumtek Bluetooth stick and my iphone essentially replaced my need for a DSLR Canon 70D. Worked well in movie as well as still and panoramic modes.
customer_reviews.author: LG from Troy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 pictures
customer_reviews.text: Horrible way to start our trip in Peru after 5 pictures the Stick broke, cheap quality avoid this merchant.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Sturdy: SELF!ie stick
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Selfie stick. Not too heavy or light. I like the blue color. The detachable Bluetooth mini remote, is a game changer. No flash on the unit for night time selfie snaps. Have not used the tripod yet. SOLID Four Stars
customer_reviews.author: SIFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Solved: Impossible to connect with Bluetooth. Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Updated from one star to five stars. Figured out the Bluetooth issue and it works great. Advice: ignore the instructions on how to connect. Click and hold button on remote. Now connect like you would to a speaker or headphones. Then open up your camera app and it should work. Original review: Solid construction and design. However, I am unable to connect with Bluetooth so it's totally unusable. The regular method used to connect any other Bluetooth device doesn't work. The directions in the manual are terrible and make no sense. The instruction video on YouTube describes a method that also does not work. I guess it's time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Compact, and Oh-So-Clever!
customer_reviews.text: This clever gadget is small and light enough to throw into your pocket or bag, but it's big on functionality. When unfolded, it's a selfie-stick with remote shutter control, but it's also a table-top or free-standing tripod base with detachable remote--great for those Zoom meetings and group shots with YOU in the picture as well. It's a little more costly than some of the others, but IMO it's the best design and best-looking (I got the one with blue trim to match my phone). Besides being one of the slimmest designs, it is also more stable than others due to the braces on the legs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Tripod legs broke on 2nd time of used👎
customer_reviews.text: Chip product and very uncomfortable to maneuver, very hard to open/pull up. The tripod leg broke the second time I used it. The only thing that worked well was the remote control. It was a shame because the size is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: I hate the phone mount/holder...:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping I could use it with ease for my I-phone 11 Pro, and although I liked its bluetooth controlled remote control, classy, and compact size, and stable tripod, I didn’t like its phone mount/holder. Mind you, I have to remove my casing in order to mount my phone which is very inconvenient because then it means I have to do it everytime I use this selfie stick. Otherwise, it won’t fit:( Everything else is cool, but sadly I have to return this as I’m looking for something that is much easier to use than this.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela SJTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for video calls between toddler and grandma!
customer_reviews.text: This has surprisingly become one of the most used devices in my home! I had been wanting a selfie stick for awhile because I needed a way to prop up my phone while taking videos of performances. Activities stopped during the shelter in place but I found another great use for it - talking to grandma! Before our daughter would always grab the phone and accidentally get off the screen. But now we can prop it up out of reach but close for calls. I really like how the stick folds up onto a light cylinder. Remote is easy to pair and use too which we have used for family photos. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Z.R.

customer_reviews.title: Selfie stick ..recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice selfie stick. Solid, seems like it would take a lot of effort to tip it over. The remote control is a USB so easy to charge. I liked the white color because it is different than other selfie sticks, which are usually black. The one thing I have check is how it takes the photo. Will update this review if i encounter problems. RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mellow

customer_reviews.title: The search is over
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried 4 other units and this is by far the best! I love the design, how it folds into itself making it much more compact and easier to get in and out of my bag. It also has a much longer telescoping rod than other ones I’ve tried too. It’s just a well rounded product. Much appreciated!!
customer_reviews.author: Torylleigh

customer_reviews.title: Works great until the remote stops working
customer_reviews.text: The selfie stick tripod worked great while it was working... Unfortunately the remote stopped working after just one trip. I received the item and tested it at home and it worked great, then took it with me on vacation and honestly barely used it, but when we did there were no issues. I packed it for a second adventure not even a month later and the remote would not connect to my phone and when it did it would not work. Now I find that after charging it, the light on the remote stays on all the time or won't turn on at all so its no longer a selfie stick, but just a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great selfie stick/stand. I have been looking for something like this for travel (once everything is back to normal). Most other products I have seen are either too short or are too bulky. This one extends to a good height and is also very durable (made of metal, aluminum I think). Bluetooth connectivity is great and useful since my phone doesn't have a 3mm jack. It might be a bit tricky to extend and open up the stand, so be careful with it the first time. But once you know how it opens, it is pretty easy. Great, durable product!
customer_reviews.author: Seath

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Must have for travelers. It is very easy to use and lightweight (instruction booklet is included). I am skeptical at first because I was not sure if it can hold my ip 11 pro max but it is actually very sturdy and stable. It connects with my phone via Bluetooth and I have not had any connection issue yet after 1 month using. It also comes with charger and the battery is quite long as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Actuation 😉
customer_reviews.text: Works well, way better than I expected for $25 or whatever I paid for it. I think it’s best characteristic is it’s ease of sync/use. COULDN’T get any easier. Just can’t. We’ve used the tripod too, a lil’ bit of a pain to actuate... but it’s sturdy. As for the main feature (the stick), it does a good job holding the phone in place. It’s never slipped out. Once again it’s kinda a pain to actuate, but once u learn it’s trickery... you’re good to go. I’d buy it again. And I’d recommend it again. So there.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Worth the extra features!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, battery for the remote lasts quite a while. Very sturdy grip on my phone (iPhone XS). Love the different ways it’s can be used. It’s super universal. I brought this before going to Mexico on vacation last month and it is perfect for taking group pictures and video chatting with my kiddos back home. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie T

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.  Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was a reasonably priced selfing stick with a nice tripod stand included. It is well made but not a fine piece of "German engineering". It is a mixture of metal and plastic. Light and stiff. It is a clever design. Only two minor negatives - the spring holding the phone is very stiff and it is also has a lot of friction when you open it up (may change with usage). If I were Atumtek, I would take this design and make it entirely out of machined aluminum and charge a lot more for it. Overall a nice design and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Our family has one and we use it daily. Conference calls, to talk to grandparents, this past weekend to take family pictures for our 4th of July celebration since no one can take our pictures. Got this for a birthday present for the grandparents and now they can use for the same and record better videos of themselves for their grandkids. They love it and now we don't have to stare at their eyebrows anymore. Never thought a selfie stick was something we needed until now.
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: Include Bluetooth pairing instructions with actual product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Once you know how to use it! I wish I thought to read the questions and answers on this site before our family photo shoot. I had gotten Bluetooth to work earlier but didn't realize I had pressed the button for 3 seconds in order for that to happen. So for our quick, one-time family photo shoot, we had to use the 10-second timer on my new IPhone 11. I was really looking forward to using the remote and posing for photos; instead it turned into a really stressful event trying to connect the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool little seliestick
customer_reviews.text: Living in Oregon, I am one of those guys who loves to spend hours out walking around one the BLM, or in the State Forrest. Took the selfie stick with me last weekend hiking through the snow and around some waterfalls. I was concerned how it would hold up out in the elements, But it worked like a champ. However, I do wish the tripod part was a little more sturdy, but that's just me looking for something to complain about. lol You won't be disappointed with this little gem. Enjoy, and get outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sam A

customer_reviews.title: Can’t video record! Beware
customer_reviews.text: you can’t record on this selfie stick! :( the remote control has only one button. It controls the off and on button by pressing it down and one press to capture a photo, with that, you’re unable to video record because pressing it down longer than 3 seconds would turn off your remote. I’ve tried to sl record on Instagram and Snapchat to no avail. I was able to photo and video record on other selfie sticks but they had two separate buttons :( so disappointed because this selfie stick is so clean and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tripod selfie stick!
customer_reviews.text: Love this selfie stick/ tripod the remote feature makes it so simple to take photos and have a set up from an angle! You really dont need to have a second person to take photos for you or be there to hold the camera because it literally makes it so much easier for you to place it down get set up and take photos with the click of a button ! I think its an awesome item that any one should have because ive been looking for something this useful in awhile and finally found the right one!
customer_reviews.author: Sxgalaxy

customer_reviews.title: Great compact Selfie/Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I love that this stick is so compact. Can be used as a selfie stick or a tripod. It's lightweight and so easy to slip into your purse and carry it around. The remote is very responsive and easy to flip on. I would've given it 5 stars if not for the cellphone cradle itself. I have a Samsung 10+ with a cover and it's a very tight fit. I've chipped and broken my nails on many occasions trying to pry open it to fit the phone in and to pull the phone out.
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: My 7th and counting...
customer_reviews.text: It's my 5th! My first was confiscated by my little girl. Bought again one for myself, confiscated by my best friend too. Bought 3rd one for myself and finally got to enjoy it . Then my other friend got jealous so bought another 2 and gave it to them. Thinking of buying more to give out on Christmas 😉 Love it so much. Thank you. First time to have selfie stick and love it.
customer_reviews.author: EmojiGirl

customer_reviews.title: Smart, compact design and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd want a selfie stick, but I wanted something to bring with me on a trip for picture taking. This one is awesome because it 1) works as both a selfie stick and tripod (dual function!), 2) the design is sleek, easy to use, and extremely compact, and 3) the quality of the product is good. The remote that comes with it fits into the handle and also works great. Highly recommend; I would not change anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product/Company
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality product, a great value. We’ve used it on many trips with many phones and it’s priceless, especially these days of Covid when You don’t want other people touching your phone to take your pic. After 8 months, the remote did stop working which was inexplicable and a minor hassle. The great news is you can buy the remote separately on the cheap at the atumtek website, but even better, an agent from the company offered to ship us one at no cost. The agent was also super responsive, helpful and kind. I recommend the product highly and the company as well.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY HOLDER
customer_reviews.text: The remote feature works fine and the base is mostly sturdy. The phone holder is kind of flimsy and weak though. Every time I use the phone in the vertical position it tilts to the right, even though I've centered it over the stick. This is really annoying because the photo ends up tilted and then I have to take more time to edit the photo and correct the angle!!! Maybe I just got one that's defective???? It's past the return time now, so I'm not able to exchange for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Ivyness

customer_reviews.title: Best SelfieStick - Bad Batch (maybe)
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best selfie stick I have purchased. This is actually my wife second one she loss the other on her last trip. Took this on a strip; it gets tossed around in/out of bag and on/off table. It just stopped synching via Bluetooth connection. Tried reset/unpair it, it still would not reconnect. I would purchase another one. This maybe just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than my others but, handle is plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one after my old one broke, because the tripod base was made of cheap plastic! I purchase this one because the description said that it was made of aluminum! The only part made out of aluminum is the telescoping stick part, which almost all selfie sticks are and the tri-pod support braces. The actual tripod base / legs are still just made of cheap plastic!. This is a much better quality then the previous one that i had and I am hoping that this one having support braces on the tripod with prevent them from breaking but i was a little disappointed when i opened it and saw that it was plastic!
customer_reviews.author: matthew k. harper

customer_reviews.title: Feels expensive and works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest selfie stick I’ve ever purchased. It’s the perfect mount for everything from a video conference call, to a quick selfie. It feels solid with just the right amount of weight that it feels much more expensive than it is. And the selfie Bluetooth shutter clicker is super easy to set up and use. This was a no-brainer and I know some of my friends and family will probably buy one too.
customer_reviews.author: BJ DeRuyter

customer_reviews.title: Well built, solid.
customer_reviews.text: The unit seems very strong and stable. The only issue is that the Bluetooth remote, which should tell the phone to take a pic or start/stop video just moved the zoom up 1 then down 1 level. I found out that you need go to settings in camera and set vol up/down keys to take photo vs zoom. Then it works great! Google is and you'll find detailed instructions.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDave

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice all in one, careful with phone placement and removal
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and fits easily in a purse we bought this to live stream our wedding. It’s a bit tricky to figure out how to open it, and the part that holds your phone is a bit difficult to separate to place your phone. It does fit my iPhone11 with a thin case on it but difficult to remove once placed. Haven’t used remote function yet so can’t comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: AltariaOP

customer_reviews.title: my wife loved it,
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this Bluetooth selfie stick to capture home time video. overall design is great and size is perfect to carry during travel. The plus feature is a tri pod mode which is very handy to mount phone or cam for point shot or self video recording. build quality is good and feels sturdy. the detachable remote is tiny any useful, I have connected it to my iPhone without any issue
customer_reviews.author: iREViEST

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for solo travel
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a solo trip to Northern Ireland in November and it was a life saver! Especially when I often had sites to myself or nearly to myself. It allowed me to still get photos. The battery lasted the whole week (I charges it once just to be sure but I don’t think I would have needed to) and it was super easy to use. The winds along the coast can get really strong so that would be the only drawback here, there’s only so much a selfie stick can hold up to especially when fully extended. Not really a reflection on this product. And it fit in my travel purse, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kay Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie stick/tripod
customer_reviews.text: I love this selfie stick/tripod! I have had it for several months and it still looks new. It is very sturdy even when all the way extended. The tripod feature works nicely. I use it to take large group photos as well as up close selfies. The remote is detachable so that he can be in the group picture. You do not have to point the remote at the tripod for it to work. Tripod holds my iPhone 11 with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Could be better but not good enough
customer_reviews.text: So the remote control, legs and the fact that it collapses inside itself are the best features. The selfie stick extension IS NOT the best. See my video.
customer_reviews.author: BKflowerbomb

customer_reviews.title: Compact but cheap
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this - Compact, lightweight. I used it a lot on a two month hiking excursion and I knew it likely wouldn’t last because the plastic parts were really cheap - sure enough it tipped over in NV and one of the legs broke off. I did get a lot of good use out of it but unless you can be super careful or if you want something to last, try another one
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Charger will NOT work!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product was okay. I used it very little, as I purchased it for a summer vacation. The charger has completely stopped working! Tried countless times, but nothing. My window for return is too late, so now this just goes to the trash. I am very disappointed. Don't know if I received a bad one or what. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JannyP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, not bulky, lightweight and good grip.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile selfie stick and easy to carry around with my purse. With social distancing, people are weary of taking photos of you with your phone I have used it for videos, taking large gathering photos and also videos while cooking. The charger lasts a long time too. It also has a good grip on my phone
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not your average stick. Or should I say schtick? Lol.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kitchen videos. TikTok sensation. It’s very classy looking. Sleek design in a telescoping way. It’s sturdy but not lightweight. Not heavy. But noticeably hefty. Legs are rigid so if you’re looking for wrap around legs. Search up a different model. The battery is slim. I really think you will be happy with this stick. P. S. Not intended as a play stick for your dog. Comes with a 3 year warranty card in box.
customer_reviews.author: Nowayfee

customer_reviews.title: Nice selfie stick – very durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable is an understatement. When you pull the legs out on this (which takes some effort), you'll feel how stable it is, even with a heavy phone attached. It extends quite a bit, and the Bluetooth remote works perfectly. I'm just really impressed here. Don't let the appearance fool you – it may look top-heavy when extended as a tripod, but it isn't going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

customer_reviews.title: challenging to get the bluetooth to connect. *fingers crossed* that is functions properly.
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality unit and seems sturdy. The bluetooth took many tries before it finally produced a green light. It is synced with my iphone 10S; hopefully it will function properly and provide years of use. 3 Year Warranty card included. I had an issue with the first unit so had to try a second one. I did contact the seller and they were very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It feel apart
customer_reviews.text: Every time I tried to charge the battery it would turn red for a moment and then go blank. It never charged. It never was able to pair with a device. When I first tried to put my phone in the holder -- the piece securing it popped right out. I love the design, look, and feel of this product. But if it doesn't work -- it is no good to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboi

customer_reviews.title: 6 weeks old and does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Item is 6 weeks old and will no longer connect to iPhone X. All instructions to resync have failed. Remote control feature is handy, however doesn't work when connected to stick or when removed. Very disappointed as return window has also closed.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Goffey

customer_reviews.title: Durable, sturdy selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome selfie stick. Took it on a hike while in UT, dropped it in the river, and it still worked! Very satisfied with the purchase. The stand is sturdy, no issues with it tumbling due to wind, and we got many good photos without needing to ask strangers to take our photo, because you know COVID-19. One complaint, it didn’t connect to iPhone 7 Plus via Bluetooth. Not sure why that was, but it connected with iPhone X just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Not for today’s phones with bulky case
customer_reviews.text: Good product only one problem. The phone holder could have been a little bigger. I have a shockproof case on my iPhone 11 Pro Max that seems to barely fit on the holder. I feel like it will break if I keep using it with my phone.So if you have a phone with a thick case you might want to look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alex rafiky

customer_reviews.title: What remote????
customer_reviews.text: I'm still YouTubing it to figure out how to use this properly. So far, the tripod aspect works great for recording a video. I had to do some editing to cut out the parts of me turning my device on and off because I do not understand where or how to install the remote and what or where the actual remote is located.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I was contemplating to buy either this selfie stick or the flexible and bendable selfie stick that some youtubers carry these days. But I am so so glad that I bought the Atumtek brand! The quality is above my expectations as it has the sleek look and “functional” design while doing its job properly. The only thing to watch out for is be careful not to clip your skin as you close the tripod legs. Overall great quality and easy Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Am I stupid?
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for assembly were fine, but I still haven’t figured out how to pair the remote with my iPhone 11. I also don’t know if it works with other camera apps. It is sturdy, however, and it was delivered quickly. In fairness, I don’t have anything else to compare this product to so it could be the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good little tripod/stick
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly good little tripod / selfie stick. It's not bombproof but it's sturdy enough for its size and weight. The little remote connected and worked well for remotely snapping pics and starting and stopping video on an iPhone 8+ running IOS 13.5.1. Very compact - about the size of a tube of toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon James

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty conecting my phone to the tripod with no specific instructions given at the begining. Eventually, figured out and it worked. The best used was as a selfie stick. The tripod was great indoors on the table or floor. It was not as sturdy outdoors as it was windy and uneven ground. Did not had any issues with the remote staying on the sick, but not sure the distance away that works best.
customer_reviews.author: pleased

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!! I love it! I purchase it for a trip to Orlando next week, but I’m already using it as a phone holder whenever I’m laying down... my hands were really tired of holding this heavy phone ! I’m so thankful to myself for buying it! And also the way it folds and it’s shape makes it really easy to carry on the side pockets of my little backpack
customer_reviews.author: GabyMC

customer_reviews.title: Works well, could have a better phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few hours to get the phone holder around my Otterbox Defender case. Got it on and now have to figure out how NOT to have the stick in the pic. Not to manufacturers: PLEASE make a phone holder that can accommodate large screen phones and protective cases
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn McCartin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product was good, the only issue I had was with the bluetooth connection. I reached out to them and explained that I was having issues. Based on the fact it wasn't working properly for me, they quickly offered me a full refund for the product. I will still say the product was good but the customer service was GREAT. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Remote lasted 5.5 hours in continual use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. I did a shoot with it in the tripod mode with the bluetooth remote and the remote worked for five and a half hours without having to recharge it. I think it is a bit fragile, but the advantage there is that it is quite lightweight. Also the grip for the camera is very tight, so it isn't going to drop your camera and it allows you to tweak how you are aiming if you want to be more precise. I'm super pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ara Lucia Ashburne

customer_reviews.title: About as good as you’re going to get!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through a couple different tripod/selfie sticks and this one is the best I’ve come accross. The tripod is actually pretty stable - even when extended completely. It certainly helps that the legs have support brackets. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this one. Just keep in mind that all of these things are small and lightweight, which can translate into feeling cheap. However, the bulk of this is made of aluminum and seems to be about as solid as something of this size can be. It’s a pretty clever design particularly when completely closed up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Stick Tripod works great happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Selfie Stick Tripod Works great. Connected easily with my Samsung S10 Plus via Bluetooth. Came charged so I was able to use it right out of the box. Charging cable included complete with light to let you know it is charging and when charge is complete. Looking forward to all the uses for this. We take a lot of group vacation photos, it is going to be easy to set up and enable me to get the best shot quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lauram Hester

customer_reviews.title: The perfect selfi stick!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing not only is it compatible but has a very cool button Clicker and tripod mount I've never had such a great selfie stick and I life! Very easy use that hold your phone very securely so no worrying about dropping your phone! My wife absolutely loves it to we both can't get enough of it! Also the customer service is amazing in fast responding I highly recommend this product anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nick jatoft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I never thought I would need one till I needed it to take photos with social distancing in place. Asking strangers to take a photo is no longer a popular option. This is perfect for distance and scenery photos. The stand works great and the remote is a great option I never knew I need it. I would highly recommend this product for anyone looking to take any kind of photos. FYI I have an iPhone XS and it fit nice and tight on the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fit iPhone 11 Promax with case
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection was a piece of cake. Remote is detachable, it’s tiny, hold on to it. Selfie stick is compact and light weight Tripod stand is a bit flimsy, be extra careful when open or you will end up breaking the leg stand. My iPhone 11 Promax with case fit in the camera holder without problem.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: Save my live streams and made me look more prof because my phone was not falling and it was kept in place . I need to learn how to work the remote and the selfie stick I’ve only used it for stand for my live streams ❤️ Sturdy and great material . I recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product was returned because it did not meet what was advertised. I looked at all product descriptions and specs and made sure I was purchasing something for my iPhone. Once the product came it did not fit my phone unless I took my phone out of its slim case and even them it seemed like it was going to crush my phone as it was so tight and difficult to put on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Charley Flippin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can use it as a web cam and also a tripod for when I travel.This selfie stick seems well made. It is sturdy and I am not afraid that my phone will fall out. I love that is also can be used as a tripod. This is a great product for families to take group photos! I also love that you can adjust the height and the button is actually a remote and can be removed from the stick!
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and compact
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent item. Does what it says it does, and is pretty sturdy. The tripod isn't as study as I had expected and it doesn't always stand without first making adjustments to the phones positioning, etc. Also feels like a gust of wind could pretty easily knock it over. The retracting and extending feels a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Davu1

customer_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED - Worst product ever purchased on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before. However, I respect the reviews I see on Amazon as verified purchases, and felt I needed to provide you my experience with this selfie stick. I purchased based on the great idea that this could also be used as a tripod. However, the remote control never worked, making this selfie stick worthless. No matter how many hours it was charged, no matter how it was situated or set up, the button never activated, and never took a picture. Do not waste your money on this product. You'll do better off with a simple selfie stick purchased in a drugstore for less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: SES Library

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: This device is larger and heavier than expected, but that also makes if feel like it’s built well. That said, on my first flight with it I had to take it out at security as I’m guessing it looks like a pipe bomb or similar on the X-ray. Maybe next time I’ll check it in my other bag. Otherwise, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy, versatile and easy to transport. Product would be even better is there is a feature to lock the button so that during transport it does not keep getting pressed accidentally. Also, opening the legs require you to completely extend or completely collapse to close the legs; would be great if you can open/close the legs without extending or collapsing it completely.
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Need to redesign the stand. Bluetooth range too shoot.
customer_reviews.text: This was great until a while. The Bluetooth Trang’s isn’t as long as I thought. I’d say up to 8-10 feet. The extension length was great. The tripod stand needs to be redesigned. It’s sturdy; however, the retracting mechanism design is poor. There is no quick and easy to to convert from stand to stick mode. When trying to put it back together, the stand broke. Tip: Find a convertible stick without the supporting beams for the leg. (There are legs that you can spread and use the center beam to support it.)
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Y.

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this item. It looks super slick and fancy at first but it’s difficult to squeeze my phone in the holder and then when I tried to use it I realized it didn’t work! The charger for the remote control would not stay charging. So I’m returning it and I’ll look for a product from another company. Either mine was just a rare defected one or lots of them have this problem. I was super disappointed. And surprised. This selfie-stick-tripod wasn’t exactly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna Donnell

customer_reviews.title: This has changed my selfie game!
customer_reviews.text: I do not regret purchasing this stick at all, at first i was skeptical but it is honestly amazing and i couldn't imagine taking selfies the old fashion way. I hardly use the stick even though it does have tremendous use. I instead opt to take the remote out and prop my phone up on its kick stand and use the remote to take photos from afar. It is easy to hide the remote in your hand and strike a beautiful pose! Or you can have your phone set to timer and put the controller down and pose quickly. Its awesome and i have recommended it to 5 people already!
customer_reviews.author: Winski

customer_reviews.title: A handy tool.
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with my selfie stick. Once I figured out how to use it I was okay. The instruction booklet could be larger in print. I have used it and it's a breeze. Even had someone ask where I got it. Hope it gets put to good use and many pictures! I really like that it fits in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great Selfie Stick and Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I don't do selfies, but this is a great portable tripod for cell phones. The remote button makes it easy to take the photo/video from a distance (up to 33' according to the instructions). Using the remote I can also shoot down low, or up high. Very stable and well-built product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Its more of a stand than a stick.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great. Pretty sturdy. However, this is really a camera stand than a selfie stick. I say that bcuz when you pull out the stick, you will have the legs sticking out. You can not fold them in and have the stick out. It makes it difficult to hold and take a picture.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this selfie stick. The tripod and remote control features are outstanding. This thing basically turns your phone into your own personal photo studio. You can set up the shot and take the pic completely hands free from your phone. Or take video, completely hands free. I originally bought this simply because I’m a small woman and my arms aren’t really long enough to get a good selfie, but I was amazed by the quality and versatility of this product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very sturdy. I just don't like the part where you put your phone. It was very hard to open and does not open enough for big phones easily (especially the Samsung Note). Also, the phone tilts slightly due to it's weight. I did not mind that part because a lot of other tripods had this problem too and I'm not a professional photographer. So if you're a perfectionist with a big/heavy phone, this might not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nahal

customer_reviews.title: Just not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This design looks great and collapses down to a very handy size, but it’s just a pain in the butt to use. You can’t just fold the legs out, you have to keep pulling out the rod and it felt to me as if I was manhandling it and might break it. With some tweaks to the design this could be a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetwater Shopper

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tri-pod to record video of myself for a class. This made it so much easier. If i need it taller i just prop it up on something (like a coffee table). Seems very sturdy even when fully extended with phone attached.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Well designed selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty cool selfie stick. You can actually see that people think about design, from the package to device itself. I wish you don’t need to open tripod every time to retract selfie stickIt. But we like it not big deal,it is seats pretty good in your hand, balanced good. Very compact and feels durable. Tripod very useful when it’s combine with selfie stick. We like white color.
customer_reviews.author: Andrii

customer_reviews.title: Edit: not so much, Solid selfie stick and tripod
customer_reviews.text: Edit: the legs became stuck and broke! I don’t use this that often so I’m quite disappointed. It is the best selfie stick I’ve owned. Wish I had it for my Russia trip when I opted for the flexible legs.. that was a mistake. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AJ3

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works well!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie stick is great! Make sure you read the directions before you take it on a trip, tho, so you know how to work the remote or you might think it's not charged. It's compact, fairly light weight and works well! I also had a customer service issue and they gave me fabulous service!
customer_reviews.author: Glamgirl17

customer_reviews.title: broken of the first use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but it broke the first time I used it. It is not easy to extend the legs to use the tripod so one of the legs broke off the very first time. If this was not an issue I would've loved this device. It is a little expensive for a selfie stick but purchased because it had the tripod. Gave it 2 starts because I do really like it or else I would've given it 1 star because it broke on the very first use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Best Most Versitalie Selfie Stick
customer_reviews.text: This stick is great in that it expands, unlike other sticks and it also turns into a mini tripod so great value considering it's a 3 in 1 IMO. Love this selfie stick. Remote is easy to pop on and off. Bluetooth never fails and battery last forever it seems like.
customer_reviews.author: lore valdes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with Bluetooth and small to carry
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product the connection to the Bluetooth is very easy. The Tripod help a lot if you like to take pictures from far, plus this is very small so is easy to carry. And have a lot of mobility in all the arms. Very recommended for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus evaristo uresti flores

customer_reviews.title: Super Excited!
customer_reviews.text: It Was Late But I Still Got It. I Was Super Excited!! I Couldn't Be Happier When I Checked It Out, I Read The Instructions. Very Easy To Use & Fits My Phone With The Phone Case Perfectly. I Use It Everyday To Watch Anything & To Video Chat. I Just Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Perales

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I love this thing. I have captured some great moments with this stick. During the CODIV, where we cannot ask others to take pics of us, the remote control and the staring stick coming very handling
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews. But this thing is amazing. Loved it for the versatility and how well it folded up. Works great as a tripod or selfie stick. The remote detaches from the stand and works great for father back shots. But the thing that prompted me to write this was I dropped the remote in the pool. The light went red and wasn’t working. I tried to blow out as much water as I could. But after trying to use it, to no avail. Ordered another one. The next day it had dried out and now works fine again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I love this tripod for my iPhone. I make youtube videos and have been trying to find a good tripod that is easy to carry around for vlogs etc. This product checked all the boxes for me. If you want a lightweight, sturdy, and reliable tripod then buy this.
customer_reviews.author: melody hughes

customer_reviews.title: Not the greasted tool
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put the phone on the mount. Pretty sure I pinch myself every time. So annoying! I was suppose to return it but my window of opportunity to returned closed, so now I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ise

customer_reviews.title: Great for pics and videos, hard to get in/out
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and the remote control is easy to use. The only thing is that it’s hard to put the phone in place — I’ve pinched my fingers many times. I wish they made it easier for the phone to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: JosCee

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.  Pinches fingers.
customer_reviews.text: This has been very handy and useful for Zoom meetings. I use it twice a week. BUT, be very careful putting your cell phone in or out of this product. It will pinch your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: K S Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work properly for remote control
customer_reviews.text: Although it can be paired up with my iPhone 11 Max Pro, I can’t take photos properly. Sometimes I could take photos for 1 or 2 times, then it was disconnected. When I closed the camera APP and opened It again, sometimes would be connected again but still repeated the same questions. Even the worst is that when it was disconnected and couldn’t be reconnect even though I tried to connect manually. I spent over 2 hours to test it but obtain the same experience. Don’t ask me to contact the dealer as I will not do it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheung Sai Hong

customer_reviews.title: Great product for ANY adventure
customer_reviews.text: Im huge on giving honest reviews. And have no problem giving products 1 star to try and keep people from wasting money. That being said... I would recommend this 10/10. By far, exceeded my expectations. Extremely durable build, easy to use, and collapses to a convenient shape for packing in a bag. Relieving to know there are still companies doing right by their consumers out there
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: Great compact selfie stick.
customer_reviews.text: I love this selfie stick, metal hinged legs are stable and it holds my cellphone perfectly. The blue detailing is a really nice touch as well. Great purchase and seller is very responsive. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ponchart

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I took this product to my African Safari. It worked very well. It is designed nice and compact. During my travel, the Bluetooth remote came loose in the shuffle and was lost. I wrote Atumtek to see if they could send me a replacement remote. They were very responsive, and in two days I received a complete new selfie stick under their product warranty. These folks understand customer service and doing everything to please their customers. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Tuncer Uysal

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I like this selfie stick because it is very compact and very easy to bring / carry on my trips. Easy to use and convenient because of the remote control. My only concern is that putting my phone at the end of the selfie sticks a little struggle because it is pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: happyamazon

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy base with supports, does not look like the feet will come loose or move so the pole is not perpendicular to the floor. It is a bit shorter than my last sitck (about 3' compared to 4ish) but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: This  self timer is very convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than the ordinary selfie rod shooting effect,has the automatic flat function,it is also relatively simple to use,the quality is very good,the material is very strong,and the height can be adjusted freely,can meet a variety of shooting needs,the most important thing is that the stability is particularly good,there will be no sloshing ,value for money satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: My first selfie stick. It super sturdy, holds the Note10+ very securely, love the blue trim and tripod feature. But nothing beats the super easy to use remote. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit iPhone 11 Pro Max with Otter Case!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice product BUT it doesn’t fit my iPhone 11 Pro Max with the Otter case. I have to remove the case in order to make it fit. Very lame to assume I’d have a $1200 phone without a case.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous002238

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this selfie stick. Used it on a trip to New Orleans and got great shots with it. I also plan on using it to take photos for a blog. The Bluetooth remote is easy to sync with your phone and the range is nice. The selfie stick folds up for easy storage, too. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtnie

product_meta.title: ATUMTEK Bluetooth Selfie Stick Tripod, Mini Extendable 3 in 1 Aluminum Selfie Stick with Wireless Remote and Tripod Stand 270 Rotation for iPhone 11/11 Pro/XS Max/XS/XR/X/8/7, Samsung and Smartphone
feature_bullets: ⭐ [Integrated Innovation Design] - The ATUMTEK Selfie Stick and tripod stand integrating together, combined with premium aluminium extendable stick, the selfie stick is extremely stable. The extendable pole is constructed with aviation-grade aluminum alloy with surface anodic oxidation process for which it will be sturdy and durable.

⭐ [Adjustable Angle & Rotable Phone Holder] - The ATUMTEK Bluetooth Selfie Stick adopts a 270 degree rotatable phone holder design, which supports mobile phone horizontal clips and vertical clamps. The 180 degree enables you to select perfect angle when you take photos. The phone holder supports devices of which the width up to 3.42 inch.

⭐ [Detatchable Bluetooth Remote & Awesome Battery Life] - The Bluetooth control distance is up to 33ft, which allows you to take photos by yourself or take group photos by taking off the remote controller. With built-in 50mAh rechargeable and recycling Lithium battery, you can continuously capture 15000 photos after fully charge via Micro USB charging port 5V/110mAh. The Bluetooth remote is compatible with IOS 7.0, Android 5.0 and above devices.

⭐ [Super Lightweight & Convenient to Carry Around] - Thanks to the hidden retractable design, it’s only 7.7 inches for folded size and extension max. 31.3 inches. You can put it in pockets or other small bags. Whenver you want to record a beautiful moment, it always be there.

⭐ [Simple to Use & Universal Fit] - Fast Bluetooth connection with your phone, you can easily use this hand holding selfie stick by pushing the shutter control button. You can use it for a close self-photography or extend it to get a larger scenery. What’s more, you will be using it as a desktop phone holder, doing live internet broadcast, binge-watching TV shows, etc. With a very flexible adjustable view height, the nape ache, shoulder pain will be substantially reduced.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,189 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
